ComicInfo.Title: Chapter 4: The Bearer of Bad Tidings
ComicInfo.Summary: In the wake of their grueling battle with King Branimir and his allies, Artesia's brother Stjepan arrives at camp with bad tidings. Agameen, Sultan of the long-dormant Thessid Empire, has invaded the Middle Kingdoms, bringing fire and storm. As the local armies parley and sort out the aftermath of the previous day's conflict, Artesia contemplates the future of their land with every power in the Known World choosing sides...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-15 14:20:14. [CVDB93770]
ComicInfo.Characters: Agameen, Akkalion, Artesia, Aspara, Awain, Bela, Borna, Demetrius, Demidice, Edrick, Ferris, Harcas, Hymachus, Malcolm, Mareesh, Mercer, Moromir, Omar, Pavel, Rogero, Sava, Stjepan, Sylus, Umasza, Ustin, Vaslav, Ydiema, Yerwin
